testimonials.text: Simon is very hardworking, ambitious, passionate and dependable.

Simon is an excellent software engineer and a versatile technology professional. I have seen Simon grow in this profession and seen him take up challenges and see-through initiatives. He is a quick learner and a very focused individual. He more than gets the job done so I recommend him always.
